examples.example: 每一秒我都在努力让自己变得更好。

translate.english: Every second I am trying hard to make myself better.

examples.example: 即使只有一秒的时间，我也会充分利用来展现自己的价值。

translate.english: Even if there is only one second of time, I will also make full use of it to show my value.

examples.example: 在那关键的一秒，他做出了最正确的决定，从而改变了整个局面。

translate.english: At that crucial second, he made the most correct decision, thus changing the whole situation.
